pl.polsl.java.lab.web

Class DatabaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.lab.web.DatabaseController

  • public class DatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the connection and provides operations to the chosen database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Lukasz Jamroz

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Method Summary

      Closes the connection with database.

      Creates the history table if such table does not exist in the database.

        database - - the database path
        username - - the database username
        password - - the database password

      • selectAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> selectAll()
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Provides access to all the results and their sources from History table.
        Returns:
        list of all the rows, where each row is represented as String[]{Source,Result}
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - passes exception, which occurs while selecting data
